1st_step.description: Import permit will be issued by The Department of Malaysian Quarantine and Inspection Services (MAQIS) within 1-2 days upon submission of complete documents.

description: Health Check Report (must have microchip number & Rabies Vaccination dates)
Pet's Vaccination Certificate (any documents in other languages required translation, and translation fee is applicable)
Address and contact number in Malaysia and exporting country
Flight ticket, Address and contact number of importer in Malaysia and exporting country

3rd_step.description: The import permit is valid for 30 days from date of issuance.

4th_step.description: Visit MAQIS counter and present all your original documents for clearance of pets.

note.title: Note :
description: All applications for pet import and export can ONLY be processed by authorized agents.
